abstract: A truly revolutionary new camera from a Silicon Valley start-up allows you to change the focal point of an image after you've taken it.
snippet: A truly revolutionary new camera from a Silicon Valley start-up allows you to change the focal point of an image after you've taken it.
lead_paragraph: Changes in cameras and photography are often incremental: a faster autofocus, a smaller body, a better sensor.

headline.main: Lytro's Camera Shoots First, Focuses Later
